title: Parry (1R132)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Maneuver: Spot an Uruk-hai to cancel the strength bonus from a possession until the regroup phase.
Lore:	Even the sword of a powerful warrior can be parried by the strength of an Uruk-hai.
Rarity:	R
